text: Stunning 6BR mountain retreat nestled at 8,500 ft, bordered by national forest and tall pines. text: Charming Rustic Cabin on the River in the Heart of Greer Step back in time with this hand-built family treasure, nestled beside the serene West Fork of the Little Colorado River. Built in 1949 and lovingly preserved, this 2-bedroom, 1-bath cabin sits on 1.70 acres of pristine land in the heart of Greer Village. A true rustic gem, this cabin offers timeless charm with its original craftsmanship, making it a rare find for those seeking peace, history, and nature. Whether you're looking for a quiet summer retreat, a base for year-round mountain adventures, or a place to make lifelong family memories, this property delivers. Designated as horse property, there's ample room to bring your animals and enjoy the open space - all while being just steps from the river's edge. Opportunities like this in Greer are few and far between. Don't miss your chance to own a piece of Arizona's high country history!

Welcome to this wonderful home nestled in the pines and aspens. This home is in a fantastic area of the already beautiful town of Greer. This well maintained home has tons of tactful touches from the amazing cabinets married with granite. Tile Kitchen and baths. The home offers two large bedrooms and fabulous bath up stairs and one bedroom along with den/office and bath down stairs. Large two car garage with cabinets/sink. Adjacent to garage is work shop. There is so much to enjoy about this wonderful home. Fishing is roughly 5 minutes away. fantastic eateries through the town of Greer. Did I mention its about 30 degrees cooler than Tucson and Phoenix in the summertime. This is a must see opportunity, Owner agent and licensed to sell real estate in Az. Don't wait to see this home. Sunrise ski lift is roughly a 20 minute drive, shopping in Eager and Springer Ville is roughly 15 minutes away, not to mention the beautiful wildlife your sure to see on the way . Backyard is fully chain linked and separate space for RV hookup.

Rustic Luxury Log Home on 4.84 Acres in Greer, AZ - Horse Property with Modern Upgrades Welcome to your dream mountain retreat! This stunning, 3,430 sq. ft. large-diameter log, 4 bedroom (2 Masters), 3 bath home is nestled on 4.84 beautifully maintained acres in the serene village of Greer, Arizona-a perfect blend of rustic charm and modern luxury. Inside, you'll find brand-new soapstone countertops, engineered wood flooring, and stainless-steel appliances, including a new refrigerator, washer and dryer. New Sierra Pacific doors and windows bathe the open-concept interior with natural light, while a HotSpring saltwater spa invites year-round relaxation under the stars. Step outside onto 2,605 sq. ft. of Trex decking, partially covered by an extended roof overhang-ideal for entertaining, dining or simply soaking in the tranquil mountain views. This property is an equestrian's paradise, featuring: " A 4-stall MD horse barn " Fenced arena " Enclosed hay barn " Tack room " Irrigated pasture land " Two water wells " 2 RV Hookups with (30-amp power) Additional highlights include an automated sprinkler system, a multi-use 1,600 sq. ft. garage/barn/workshop, and plenty of space for recreation or expansion. Whether you're seeking a private getaway, a full-time residence, or a turnkey horse property, this rare Greer gem delivers unmatched lifestyle and value.

Welcome to one of the most remarkable properties in Greer AZ. Nestled amidst the serene beauty of the National Forest, this custom built 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms log cabin offers an unparallel experience with its strategic location bordering the National Forest on two sides. You'll wake up to breathtaking views of the legendary Greer Meadow, often graced by elk & deer. Enjoy a short walk across the meadow to the tranquil waters of the Little Colorado River adding to the charm and allure of this exceptional property. Conveniently in the heart of Greer you'll find yourself within walking distance to all the attractions of Greer activities. The property boasts a spacious parking area with easy access year-round. Escape to timeless mountain charm in this extraordinary large-diameter log cabin located in the highly sought-after Greer Acres subdivision. Crafted with massive hand-peeled logs and authentic mountain architecture, this cabin boasts a grand lodge-style presence with vaulted ceilings, a floor-to-ceiling stone fireplace, and forest views from every angle. Featuring 3 bedrooms (with an additional large closet used as extra bed space) and 2.75 bathrooms, this home offers both comfort and space for full-time living or a luxurious seasonal escape. BORDERING THE SITGREAVES NATIONAL FOREST! Discover the perfect opportunity to build your dream cabin on this stunning 1-acre home site located just outside of Greer, Arizona in the prestigious gated community of Hidden Meadow Ranch. Tucked away at over 8,500 feet elevation and bordering the Sitgreaves National Forest, this parcel offers privacy, tranquility and direct access to thousands of acres of pristine forest. Hidden Meadow Ranch is a premier high-country community offering top-tier amenities including a lodge, seasonal restaurant, guest cabins, equestrian facilities with horse barn and riding arenas, private trout pond, family recreation barn, and an on-site ranch manager. Residents enjoy maintained roads with year-round access, including snow removal in winter. Utilities are already in place, with underground power and phone to the lot line, a private community water system, and ready for septic system. Outdoor enthusiasts will love the proximity to world-class fly fishing, hiking, horseback riding, and skiing. Sunrise Park Resort is just a short driveway for snow sports, while nearby lakes and rivers offer abundant fishing and wildlife viewing opportunities. All of this is just minutes from the charming village of Greer, known for its rustic lodges, cozy restaurants, and mountain-town charm. Whether your ready to build now or invest in a legacy property, this exceptional lot provides the ideal canvas for a peaceful, luxurious mountain retreat.
formatted_address: 7 N County Road St Units 46 & 1332, Greer, AZ, 85927
